These daily vibration reminders can help strengthen your back while also training your brain to recognise slouching.

entry.title: Bossbon® Fetal Baby Heart Rate Doppler
entry.summary:
Vendor: Medic Supplies
Type:
Price: 99.99

Have Peace of Mind At Your Side With A Quality Doppler For Babies

Suitable after the 12th week of pregnancy, the Bossbon® fetal doppler allows any soon-to-be mommy to hear their baby's heartbeat clearly, and as often as they'd like.

Designed with a sharp OLED display and quality built-in speaker, future moms can share precious moments in real-time.

 

Purchase directly from our Toronto Warehouse! Includes 1-year warranty plus free 2-4 day shipping in Canada. 

 

 

*

*Free 5-7 Day Canada Wide Express Shipping on orders over $99** 

 

Specifications

Model Number:          WF-FD500
Power Source:             Electricity
Warranty:                    1 Year
Material:                      Plastic, ABS
Safety standard:         EN60601-1
Function:                       Baby Heart rate monitor
Certificate:                   CE , USA Passed
Working Frequency:   2.0 MHz
Weight:                         270g
Battery :                         AAA Battery x 2

 

With a fetal doppler, you may listen to your baby's heartbeat - Pregnancy is full of joy and anxieties as you anticipate the arrival of your infant. Some expectant parents use fetal dopplers for peace of mind or to begin communicating with their baby.

What is a fetal doppler, and how does it work?
A Fetal doppler is a portable ultrasound equipment that is used to listen to a baby's heartbeat starting around week 13 of pregnancy. They function in the same way as an ultrasound in the doctor's office, but in a pocket-sized gadget. Medical personnel can utilise them, although some are meant for at-home usage.

A gel is placed to the belly, much as when you go to the doctor, to help get a better reading of Baby's heartbeat. In between checkups, fetal dopplers may be a useful tool for keeping track of and bonding with your growing child.

While fetal dopplers are safe, finding the sound of the baby's heartbeat can be difficult for inexperienced persons. As a result, a fetal doppler should never be used in place of routine doctor or ultrasound visits. Consult your doctor or health care provider before beginning to use a fetal doppler to determine what is best for you and your baby.

Individuals with chronic diseases such as asthma, cystic fibrosis, COPD (Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease), emphysema, and other respiratory ailments frequently utilise Portable Handheld Nebulizer as their primary medicine delivery source.

The Portable Handheld Nebulizer converts liquid medicine into a mist that the patient may inhale straight into their lungs. A portable nebulizer can either be powered by batteries or connected into a vehicle socket. They're small enough to fit in a backpack or a briefcase.

You'll need a doctor's prescription to acquire a nebulizer, or you may get one through your pediatrician's office. People frequently receive breathing therapy at their doctor's office. What Solution Do I Use?

How long does the one charge last?

A single charge will last many cleaning sessions and will run for hours. The sprayer has a built-in 2000mAh lithium battery which is powerful enough for continuous use. 

How long does a refill last?

The handheld sprayer for disinfectants is designed to spray thin layers over large surfaces, making it very efficient at maximizing your solution. A single fill will last many cleaning sessions

Wall Mounted Automatic Hand Sanitizer Dispenser With Infrared Thermometer

As time is passing, the ‘new normal’ is becoming a way of life for everyone, new habits and newly gained consciousness about health and hygiene are causing people to be more health-conscious, maintain distance and follow COVID regulations. Out of all, hand sanitization has found its universal acceptance. Automatic hand sanitizer with temperature sensors is an excellent alternative to traditional hand sanitizers, especially in the COVID era. Even government and other public facilities are installing hand sanitizers at places that become a shared means for transmission of disease.

Many are opting for wall-mounted automatic hand sanitizer dispensers to avoid contact as they offer an added layer of protection to the users. Our Automatic hand sanitizer dispenser comes with an Infrared thermometer which gives you the automatic temperature reading without any contact.

Hands contribute the maximum to the transmission of diseases. Places like public washrooms, eating places, or workspaces are shared means that have higher chances of transmitting diseases among the staff or customers, hence personal hygiene becomes a point of concern.

Basic benefits of using the automatic hand sanitizer dispenser

  • It gives you a truly touchless experience, involving no hassle of pressing buttons, pumps, and handles.
  • User friendly, the ease of use ensures its feasibility. It requires no effort to operate hence everyone can use it without having to figure out how the handles might work.
  • It delivers the standard dose to everyone, enough to clean both hands. It causes minimum to no wastage, which isn’t the case with the manual hand sanitizers that at times tend to lead to wastage.
  • It eliminates a contact point, unlike manual hand sanitizers that require pushing of the pump to release the sanitizer which can transmit the germs. Automatic hand sanitizer dispensers have no common contact point which cuts down the possibility of disease transmission.
  • Wall-mounted hand sanitizer dispensers have a sleek and stylish appearance, so they add a modern touch to the places they are installed in. It indeed gives a high-end vibe to your environment.
Keeping workplaces, especially medical facilities healthy is highly important for the employees and visitors alike. Having infectious disease control measures to prevent COVID transmission is critical to maintaining safety at the workplace in order to have your employees feel safe at work in the wake of the COVID-19 pandemic. The far-reaching benefits of hand sanitizer with temperature sensors make it worth buying. Get in touch with us today to get a hold of one of this must-have equipment for your medical facility or workplace.

 Curbside Pick Up Available - Call 1-888-271-3093

*Free 2-4 Day Canada Wide Express Shipping on orders over $99*
Pulse oximeters allow you to monitor your blood oxygen saturation in the comfort of home. Buy this Digital Fingertip Pulse Oximeter at the best online price from Medic Supplies Canada.

Pulse Oximeters have become a new non-invasive and painless method to measure the oxygen saturation level. This digital device has the potential to detect even small changes in how efficiently oxygen is being carried from the heart. It is one of the most necessary equipment in a care setting like emergency rooms, doctor’s clinics, and hospitals.

Common uses of a pulse oximeter

  • Examining if someone is in need of help for breathing.
  • Gauging how well a new lung medication is working.
  • Evaluating how helpful a ventilator is.
  • Determining someone’s ability to tolerate increased physical activity by measuring their oxygen levels on a regular basis.
  • It helps in monitoring the oxygen levels of a patient during or after surgical procedures requiring sedation.
  • It also helps in understanding how effective supplemental oxygen therapy is working for a patient.
  • It also helps in assessing if someone momentarily stops breathing while they are asleep which happens in cases of sleep apnea.

The purpose of having pulse oximeters handy is being able to assess how well a heart is pumping oxygen through the body at any given moment. Buy pulse oximeters online in Canada at fair prices for your periodic use and monitor the health of individuals with the types of conditions that affect blood oxygen levels.

Owning pulse oximeters can help:

  • Keep a track of oxygen saturation over time.
  • Alert to critically low levels of oxygen, especially in newborns.
  • People with cardiovascular conditions or chronic respiratory problems feel at ease when pulse oximeters are accessible.
  • Keep a track of oxygen saturation levels in people under anesthesia.
  • Show hazardous side effects in people who take drugs that are prone to affecting breathing or oxygen saturation.
  • Assess the effectiveness of breathing interventions like oxygen therapy and ventilators.
  • Medical professionals, physicians evaluate the safety of the patient with respiratory or cardiovascular problems during exercise or physical activity.
Pulse oximeter provides results within a 2% difference either way of what it is in reality. For instance, if a reading says 82%, the true oxygen saturation level may be anywhere from 80% to 84%. Nevertheless, it is always recommended to consider an individual's quality of waveform and assessment for accuracy. Get yourself a finger oximeter in Canada at Medic supplies for a fair price.
